item.description: A large healing potion made from brewed herbs.

item.description: A sleeveless shirt for hot summer days.

item.description: Sıcak havalarda giymek için kısa zırh.

item.name: Koyu Yeşil Dye
item.description: A vial containing Koyu Yeşil dye.

item.name: Pile of Ash
item.description: A pile of ash similar to volcanic ash.

item.name: Mana Potion
item.description: A dark, sirupy brew, with a smell reminiscent of manaberries.

item.name: Golden Scorpion Stinger
item.description: A golden scorpion stinger, tipped with lethal poison.

item.name: Monster Oil Potion
item.description: A dark, oily liquid with a sinister stench.

item.name: Siyah Scorpion Stinger
item.description: A Siyah scorpion stinger, dripping with poison.

item.name: Snake Tongue
item.description: The forked tongue of a snake.

item.name: Mountain Snake Tongue
item.description: The forked tongue of a mountain snake.

item.name: Grass Snake Tongue
item.description: The forked tongue of a grass snake.

item.name: Cave Snake Tongue
item.description: The forked tongue of a cave snake.

item.name: High Priest Crown
item.description: A golden crown with an enchanted ruby.

item.name: Monster Skull Helmet
item.description: The conserved skull of a mysterious ancient monster.

item.name: Desert Hat
item.description: While the desert hat is perfect for sand storms, it won't help you much against a blow to the head.

item.name: GM Cap
item.description: A cap which identifies you as a GM.

item.name: GM Robe
item.description: A light and shimmering silk robe made for GMs.

item.name: Mouboo Figurine
item.description: A small, wooden figurine of a mouboo.

item.name: Warped Log
item.description: A piece of wood, warped and twisted by some unnatural force.

item.name: Lifestone
item.description: A small crystal shard, warm to the touch.

item.name: Druid Tree Branch
item.description: A branch cut off from the druid tree. It feels strangely leathery to the touch.

item.name: Purification Potion
item.description: A transparent, odorless liquid that feels strangely lighter than water.

item.name: Siyah Boots
item.description: Steel toe capped boots, designed to keep your feet very well protected.

item.name: White Cake
item.description: A delicious white cake. Would go good with strawberries.

item.name: Chocolate Cake
item.description: A scrumptious chocolate cake. Real chocolate guaranteed.

item.name: Orange Cake
item.description: A tangy orange cake. Made from real oranges.

item.name: Apple Cake
item.description: A crisp apple cake. Real apple pieces inside!

item.name: Diluted Concentration Potion
item.description: A bottle of diluted concentration potion.

item.name: Dark Concentration Potion
item.description: This potion smells like burnt sugar.

item.name: Mopox Cure Potion
item.description: A gooey brew with a vile smell, supposedly able to cure Mopox.

item.name: Laced Chocolate Cake
item.description: A scrumptious chocolate cake, with a dash of Mopox cure potion.

item.name: Laced Orange Cupcake
item.description: A very soft orange cupcake, laced with Mopox cure potion.

item.name: Towel
item.description: You can dry yourself off with it if it still seems to be clean enough. - Douglas Adams

item.name: Slow Poison Potion
item.description: A Sarı potion with a fresh, citric scent.

item.name: Pinkie Hat
item.description: With this, you'll fit right in with those strange pinkies.

item.name: Fluffy Hat
item.description: Now you can wear fur on your head.

item.name: Bat Teeth
item.description: The teeth from a bat. Rather sharp.

item.name: Terranite Ore
item.description: Some ore collected out of terranite.

item.name: Sailor Hat
item.description: A hat worn by brave sailors.

item.name: Captain's Hat
item.description: A hat worn by the bravest captains.

item.name: Terranite Helmet
item.description: A magical helmet made out of semi-polished granite that was enchanted to be very light. Great for mages on the battlefield.

item.name: Terranite Chest
item.description: A nice piece of armor made out of terranite ore.

item.name: Jack O Soul
item.description: The soul of a Jack O.

item.name: Knife
item.description: A small knife; the perfect weapon for a beginner.

item.name: Ranger Hat
item.description: A leather hat traditionally worn by rangers.

item.name: Antler Hat
item.description: A hat with antlers sticking out of it.

item.name: Christmas Tree Hat
item.description: A hat shaped like a Christmas tree.

item.name: Santa Beard Hat
item.description: Now you will look just like Santa Claus!
